translation: Fix your mind on Me; be devoted to Me; sacrifice to Me; bow down to Me; having thus united your whole self to Me, taking Me as the supreme goal, you will come to Me.
commentary: 9.34 Manmanah with mind filled with Me? Bhava be thou? My devotee: My devotee? Madyaji sacrificing unto Me? Me,unto Me? Namaskuru bow down? Me to Me? Eve alone? Will you come thou shalt come? having united? Evam thus? Atmana the self? devoted to Me taking Me as the Supreme Goal.Commentary Fill thy mind with Me. Fix your head? heart and hands on Me. Get your heart in tune with Me. Become a true worshipper.
